thread.title: Grasp Technologies Earns Spot on the 2015 Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Companies
thread.title_full: Grasp Technologies Earns Spot on the 2015 Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Companies - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Grasp Technologies Earns Spot on the 2015 Inc. 5000 List of Fastest-Growing Companies
text:
Grasp Technologies
SAN DIEGO Grasp Technologies, the leader in data management, consolidation, and visualization of data for the travel industry today announced that it has been named to the 2015 Inc. 5000 list, an exclusive ranking of the nation's fastest-growing private companies.
Ranked #1827, Grasp has been recognized for its 218% growth over the last three years and for creating new jobs to support its strategic growth plan. This award speaks to Grasp's dedication to provide leading software and solutions to some of the industry's most challenging data needs for TMCs, corporations, governments, financial institutions, consortia and technology vendors.
"It is a great honor to be recognized with such a prestigious award," said Erik Mueller , CEO of Grasp Technologies. "The remarkable growth we have experienced over the past few years is a testament to the true entrepreneurial spirit of our entire team."
In the last year alone, Grasp has announced several new partnerships with some the industry's most innovative companies and has expanded its global footprint to service clients in over 100 countries. Additionally, Grasp has continued to stay ahead of the competition adding enhancements to current offerings and introducing new products to its already impressive portfolio of solutions.
About Grasp Technologies
www.grasptechnologies.com
Grasp Technologies helps clients navigate constantly changing business environments by providing the right combination of custom and standardized data management solutions and support. Grasp was founded in 1996 and works extensively in the travel industry and other ancillary industries worldwide. Grasp has offices in San Diego, California and Columbus, Ohio. For more information, please contact Dave M. Lukas at dave@grasptech.com .
